ai-tha-ap92:0.3_0: the Elder Tissa related to the Flame Tree
ai-tha-ap92:2.2_0: I threw a stone down in the sky,
ai-tha-ap92:3.1_0: After going forth in the body,
ai-tha-ap92:4.1_0: On the two occasions when the other goes forth
ai-tha-ap92:4.2_0: it was all over the flower.
ai-tha-ap92:4.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap92:5.2_0: The eighteen years of great wave.
ai-tha-ap92:7.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Palm.
ai-tha-ap92:8.1_0: Seeing the tenth thoughts of the Elder Padumuttara,
ai-tha-ap92:9.1_0: The ninth sub-chapter on three is finished.
ai-tha-ap92:11.2_0: the ignoble one with joined palms:
ai-tha-ap92:11.4_0: Perceiving a sound, they perceive it as they have,
ai-tha-ap92:11.6_0: your wisdom is on all sides,
